name: 楊育修
objective:
本課程旨在探究文化與科技的關係，以及科技社會結構如何影響我們的思考。在科技與社會快速變化的過程中，課程將帶領學生發掘科技創新的可能性，這也促使許多文化實踐需重新思考，以適應此刻以媒體驅動的社會，以及如何將它們被應用於策展、文化活動和相關的創作中。本課程亦涉及科技本質上的探索，以了解它如何與文化變革密切相關，包括人文、社會科學、虛擬創作、人工智慧、數位典藏、媒體藝術和媒體傳播等面向上。
The course examines the relationship between culture and technology and how tech-social structure works to shape our ideas. Exploring the possibilities of technological innovation in rapid change, many cultural practices need to be rethought and reworked for a further media-driven society and how they are adopted into curating exhibitions, cultural events, and related productions. The course also addresses the nature of technology in general to understand how it is linked closely with cultural change, in terms of humanities, social sciences, virtual contents, artificial intelligence, digital archives, media art, and media communication.
